reviews.name: As Seen on TV Ove Glove Hot Surface Handler
reviews.reviewText: I've used this product for several years, and finally wore out my first one. The newer ones have material on the outside that helps you grip better, so when purchasing them I was a little leery. When I received them I couldn't have been happier. My old one was over 5 years old, a little larger and didn't have grips on it. I used to have to use another pot holder so that I could use both hands, but not with the new ones. They grip so well that a one-handed grab is all you need on most pans coming out of the oven. Another thing that's great is one glove fits either hand, so it doesn't matter if you're right or left handed. This is a great buy!
reviews.title: BEST POT HOLDER EVER

reviews.name: As Seen on TV Ove Glove Hot Surface Handler
reviews.reviewText: These met all my expectations..Actually my elderly mother wanted one and gave one as a gift.She's very happy with it.
reviews.title: Pricey but worth it

reviews.name: As Seen on TV Ove Glove Hot Surface Handler
reviews.reviewText: I thoroughly enjoy using the Ove Glove in my daily cooking. I am amazed at the absolute insulating protection from the hot surfaces I handle from the oven or stovetop. Be careful when using with boiling substances as the steam goes right through and watch that other hand. I recommend a second Ove Glove when the cook gets really busy moving hot pots and platters around! I would like to see a "2-for" offer at a reduced price offer from the manufacturer to promote safe use of the product.
reviews.title: Suggest getting Two!

reviews.name: As Seen on TV Ove Glove Hot Surface Handler
reviews.reviewText: The Ove Glove is the best thing for handling hot items out of the oven or off the BBQ. It can be used on either hand. It is very comfortable and I feel none of the heat from the oven. Anyone who cooks can really use one or two of these.
reviews.title: 10 January 2012

reviews.name: As Seen on TV Ove Glove Hot Surface Handler
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I have been using Ove Gloves since we first saw them come on the market. We're on our second pair. Our daughter just moved into her first apartment, and we got a pair for her. It's all we use. I use them often when I'm BBQing, as well. I just wish they weren't so expensive. Even if they were sold in 2s for a discounted price.
reviews.title: Expensive, they do a good job.
